UAVariable.Description: Indicates in which domain or for what purpose the MachineryItem is used.

To be used by end users to store the location of the machine in a scheme specific to the end user. Servers shall support at least 60 Unicode characters for the clients writing this value, this means clients can expect to be able to write strings with a length of 60 Unicode characters into that field.
A human-readable, localized name of the manufacturer of the MachineryItem.
A human-readable, localized name of the model of the MachineryItem.
A globally unique resource identifier provided by the manufacturer of the machine

A string containing a unique production number of the manufacturer of the MachineryItem. The global uniqueness of the serial number is only given in the context of the manufacturer, and potentially the model. The value shall not change during the life-cycle of the MachineryItem.

UAObject.Description: Description and status of an injection unit

UAVariable.Description: Id (e.g. serial number) of the barrel
Number of the injection unit
information if the injection unit is used in the current running production
Information if the injection unit is physically installed on the injection machines

UAObject.Description: container for the barrel temperature zones of the injection unit
Information about a temperature zone e.g. on moulds and barrels

UAVariable.Description: Current temperature of the zone
Indication how the temperature is currently controlled
Number of the zone
Indication if the temperature zone is physically present and connected
Name of the zone
Nominal temperature (absolute value)
Location of the temperature zone on a barrel. Counting starts with 1 beginning from the feeding. The highest position is at the nozzle.

UAObject.Description: Management of production jobs on the machine and information on their status including process parameters
Job that is currently active on the machine

UAVariable.Description: Indication if the machine continues the production even if the nominal output has been reached
Name of the cumstomer for that the job is produced
Description of the job
Name of the job
Array of material names used for the job
Total number (sum of all cavities) of parts that shall be produced by the job
Array of descriptions of the products produced by the job

uax:ListOfString.uax:String: screw cap for PET bottels with 38mm diameter

UAVariable.Description: Additional description of the production dataset which is needed for the job

Value.uax:String: Dataset for the production of screw cap 38mm

UAVariable.Description: Name of the production dataset which is needed for the job
Array of product names produced by the job

UAMethod.Description: Method for setting the data for cyclic jobs

UAVariable.Description: Name of the current production lot

UAMethod.Description: With this Method the client (e.g. MES) requests the machine to change the JobStatus to JOB_FINISHED_8
With this Method the client (e.g. MES) requests the machine to change the JobStatus to JOB_INTERRUPTED_7

UAVariable.Description: Number of bad parts produced in the current job
Number of finished cycles in the job
Number of good parts produced in the current job
Total number of parts produced in the current job
Current status of the job
Number of test sample parts produced in the current job
Time of the recently finished cycle

UAMethod.Description: Setting the cycle and parts counters for the job to 0
With this Method the client (e.g. MES) request the machine to change the JobStatus to JOB_IN_PRODUCTION_6
Directs the machine to stop at the end of the current cycle

UAVariable.Description: Description of the location of the machine given by the machine operator or OPC client

UAMethod.Description: Method for setting the server time together with TimeZoneOffset

UAVariable.Description: Difference of the local time to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) given by the machine operator or OPC client
Description of the machine given by the machine operator or OPC client
Name of the machine controller
Indicates in which domain or for what purpose a device is used.
Name of the company that manufactured the device
Model name of the device
Identifier that uniquely identifies, within a manufacturer, a device instance
Information which LogbookEvents are supported by the machine

UAObject.Description: Current configuration of a machine related to a Manufacturing Execution System (MES)

UAVariable.Description: List of the standstill reasons from which one is selected by the operator in the case of a standstill
Indication if the list StandstillReasons has been modified by the MES and may not be changed by the machine

UAObject.Description: Current status of a machine related to the MES
Text message sent from the MES to be shown on the machine

UAVariable.Description: Id of the message
Text of the message
Severity of the message

UAObject.Description: Control of the production of the machine by MES

UAVariable.Description: Indication if semi-automatic and automatic run of the machine is allowed by MES

UAMethod.Description: Method for disabling the semi-automatic and automatic run of the machine
Method for enabling the semi-automatic and automatic run of the machine

UAVariable.Description: Indication if ProductionStatus may have the value PRODUCTION_4
Production status when the machine is in automatic or semi-automatic mode
Classification of the message
Id of the message
Text of the message
Severity of the message
Id of the StandstillReason set by the operator after a standstill occurs

UAObject.Description: Information on the current status of the machine

UAVariable.Description: Indication if the machine is physically present and connected
Current machine mode (as defined by mode selector on the machine)

UAObject.Description: Container for the user(s) of the machine
